Kajal Aggarwal Biography | Wiki | Height | Weight | Age | Family

Bolly Reporter
8 months ago

Kajal Aggarwal is an Indian Film Actress, Former Model, and Playback Singer. She predominantly appears in Bollywood and South Indian movies.

Biography & Wiki

Kajal Aggarwal’s nickname is Kaju. She was born on 19 June 1985 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 34 years. Kajal’s Zodiac is Gemini. Kajal Aggarwal was born and brought up in a Punjabi family settled in Mumbai. Her hometown is Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Figure Measurements32-26-32
Hair ColorBlack
Eye ColourBlack

Family Members

Her father Vinay Aggarwal is an entrepreneur in the textile business and her mother Suman Aggarwal is a confectioner. Kajal’s younger sister Nisha Aggarwal is an actress in Telugu, Tamil, and Malayalam cinema.

Education and School, College

Kajal Aggarwal studied at St. Anne’s High School, fort and completed her pre-university education at Jai Hind College. She pursued her graduation in mass media, with a specialization in marketing and advertising, from Kishinchand Chellaram College.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There was a buzz that Kajal Aggarwal has an affair with “Bahubali” star Prabhas.

Kajal Aggarwal filmography

Kajal Aggarwal works in Tamil and Telugu Film Industry. She was made her screen debut in 2004 with Hindi Film Kyun! Ho Gaya Na.. where she had a minor supporting role as the friend of Diya. Her first Telugu film Lakshmi Kalyanam (2007). Kajal established herself as one of the leading & commercial successful actor of South India.

She played a lead role in the high budget Telugu historical drama Magadheera, alongside Ram Charan Teja, which saw her playing double roles for the first time. The film, directed by S. S. Rajamouli, received overwhelming critical acclaim, while Aggarwal, in particular, was praised for her portrayal of a princess. In July 2011 Kajal made her Bollywood comeback after seven years with a leading role in the police story Singham, a remake of the same-titled 2010 Tamil film.

She worked in many other commercial successful Hit films including Darling (2010), Brindavanam (2010), Mr. Perfect (2011), Businessman (2012), Naayak (2013), Baadshah (2013), Govindudu Andarivadele (2014), Temper (2015), Khaidi No. 150 (2017), etc. Kajal also sang a Song “Yenaithu” in Kannada Film Chakravyuha.

Awards & Recognition

Kajal has been nominated for four Filmfare Awards South. She is the brand ambassador for Lux. She endorses several retail and jewelry stores in south India — RS Brothers in Hyderabad, Sri Lakshmi Jewellery in Puducherry and AVR in Salem.

In 2010, she won the CineMAA Award for Best Actress (Telugu) for the film Brindaavanam.

Salary and Net Worth

Kajal Aggarwal has a net worth of ₹66 crores as of now. She is taking ₹1-2 Crore per movie as salary. She has four luxury cars worth ₹ 3 crores and two houses worth ₹ 7 crores.

Facts about Kajal Aggarwal

  • Once FHM magazine issued a topless photo of her, but she later admitted that it was an altered picture of her.
  • When she was doing her final year internship with L’Oreal, a photographer recommended her to try her luck in modeling. Later, she had a photoshoot; and as a result, she grabbed her first South Indian film alongside Nana Patekar.
  • Kajal is also known as Miss Congeniality in the South Indian film industry due to her friendly nature and ability to get along with others well.
  • She is a good friend of actress Tamannaah Bhatia and actor Ram Charan.
  • She did a few Hindi films like Kyun! Ho Gaya Na, Singham and Special 26.
  • She supports PETA’s initiative to Ban Animal Circuses to stop the torture faced by animals in circuses.
